---
title: Introduction to Python
description: |
  Python is a popular language for scientific computing, and it is great for general-purpose programming as
  well. This introductory course will walk you through the basics of programming in Python. We will cover the
  main language features – variables and data types, conditionals, lists, for/while loops, list
  comprehensions, dictionaries, writing functions, and working with external libraries.
title-block-banner: true
